summary:
The tyranny of Tanned skinned vampires is over!!!

Vampires in the game are more paler as well as the player vampire.

True Death works with Undead vampire as long use the patch version.
descriptionHtml:
Undead Vampires 

Don\'t forget to endorse this mod if you like or even a kudos is fine as well!!!!!!!!!

This Mod aims to make every vampire in Skyrim more Paler and little bit more undead looking and it changes all other vampires expect for beast race they looked good already. Also this mod will make your vampire charter paler as well and their are two version one that makes just your vampire charter paler and the other that makes you and every other vampire paler as well.

Snow white vampires: is for vanilla vampire players mine is for Dawnguard players and yes they if you look closely you will see differences between our work but I tired keep his them but with mine own taste.Before anyone ask this mod 100% my work only thing I used was his picture as guide to get the feel of how and undead vampire should look and used his mod for a while before I went to Dawnguard and stopped using it because it messed with Dawnguard vampire faces and changed some of their eyes as well and someone requested I make Dawnguard version on the USKP face and eye fix so I did that but I did that and this mod grew bigger and some else though I should make it stand alone and I did just that.

Snow White Vampires Link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11894        

True Death: A mod that makes vampire turn into pile ask when they die or a blood pile 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23890/

Race Menu: will work with Undead Vampires but you have to do a little a extra work
in order to get them work together. First go into the race menu and set you skin tone to Undead vampire pale and exit the menu and save you game and reload it and the face mismatch is gone. Note: if you cure your self you will need to go into the race menu and change you skin tone back and your eye color as well. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/

compatibility Known so far:
Better Vampires 
True Death- if using patch version
RaceMenu 
 Requirements:

-Requires the latest version of Skyrim (1.8) and Dawnguard installed. Make sure you load this file after the Unofficial Skyrim Patch. 

- Installation:

Use the Nexus Mod Manager, or simply drag and drop the .esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.  

Instructions on how to make the skin tone change work,  if the player is already infected with vampirism: Use your Vampire Lord transformation power and then revert.

If you are not a Vampire Lord yet, first you have to \"cure\" yourself using the console, open up the console using the tilde button, and type player.setrace <your race> and enter. Replace the <your race> with one of the following:

BretonRace
DarkElfRace
HighElfRace
ImperialRace
NordRace
OrcRace
RedguardRace
WoodElfRace

Now, on to reinfecting yourself, open the console again and type player.setrace <desiredrace>vampire and enter. Replace the <desiredrace> with one of the following:

BretonRace
DarkElfRace
HighElfRace
ImperialRace
NordRace
OrcRace
RedguardRace
WoodElfRace

Example: Say you are a Breton Vampire, you will have to use \"Player.setrace Bretonrace\" (without the quotes) press ENTER and while the console is still open type \"Player.setrace Bretonracevampire\". If you are missing your vampire skills, feed and you will get them back
author: Void123

files.name: Undead Looking Vampires and Deadly Mutilation Patch
